invite.company-member:
Hello, {{name}}! {{company}} has invited you to join their team. 

 To accept the invitation, click the link below: 

 {{link}} 

 If you have any questions, please contact {{company}} directly. 

 Thanks, 

 The {{company}} Team

web-home.question: Questions
web-home.banner-1: Seamless delivery solutions for your business
web-home.content-1: Now the only thing you have to touch is your phone. Your parcels are always on hand.
web-home.content-2: Welcome to “Sawaed Logistics”, the application that embodies the spirit of progress and ease in the world of shipping and delivery. We take pride in offering an advanced and efficient platform that combines ease of use and distinguished logistical service...
web-home.content-3: At Sawaeed Logistics, we realize that your needs vary, which is why we offer a wide range of services. Whether you need fast or economical shipping, we have options that fit your needs and budget.
web-home.banner-4: Manage all your shipments in one place
web-home.content-4: Take advantage of our services and solutions designed to meet all your shipping needs.
web-home.content-5: Go with “Sawaed Logistics” and enjoy the best experience in sending parcels. Download the application now and start your journey with us.
web-home.content-6: Join the 'Sawaeed Logistics' family today and enjoy a unique experience in the world of sending parcels. Whether you want to send a surprise gift or move large goods, we are here to make the process easy and efficient.
web-home.warningcontent: Common warning signs of fraudulent attempts via mail, text or online,...
web-home.term: Terms of use of the site
